monogr.title: The Commentaries of Isho‘dad of Merv, Bishop of Hadatha (c. 850 A.D.), in Syriac and English

biblStruct.note: v. 1. On the Gospels, translation with introduction and notes by James Rendel Harris. v. 2. On Matthew and Mark, Syriac text. v. 3. On Luke and John, Syriac text. v. 4. On the Acts and Catholic Epistles, translation and Syriac text. v. 5. pt. 1. On th Epistles of St. Paul, translation. pt. 2. On the Epistles of St. Paul, Syriac text.

body.bibl: Gibson, Margaret Dunlop. The Commentaries of Isho‘dad of Merv, Bishop of Hadatha (c. 850 A.D.), in Syriac and English. 5 vols. Horae Semiticae 5-7, 10-11. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1911.
